text: Zion and Lennox is a reggaeton duo formed in 2001. It is made up of Felix Gerardo Ortiz "Zion" and Gabriel Enrique Pizarro "Lennox", both from Carolina, Puerto Rico. Throughout their music career, they have received nominations for various awards such as Billboard Latin Music Awards, Latin American Music Awards, ASCAP, among others, and won in the "Best Artist" category. On November 13, 2024, the duo Zion & Lennox announced their separation, after two decades of collaboration. == References == Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Musical groups established in 2001
title: Zion & Lennox
